review_text: I've taking AP courses most of my educational life and this was a wonderful  way to bring the skills instilled in me over the years to the forefront of my mind when trying to educate and brand myself as a qualified, and articulate copywriter. This course was definitely useful and worth the cost. I also completed it in one night without boredom . Your money is not wasted here. Ask me directly on IG if you think this is a bot review  @jessi.len .

I have a degree in Writing and I still took a significant amount of knowledge away from this course, frankly I feel I got a bargain. 

However, I don‚Äôt know why the director, director of photography, AD, or frankly ANY crew member on this set did not give the poor instructor some bloody chapstick. Did you hate the guy?
Short but sweet!

This is the first course I followed from start to end with a strong focus. I wrote this review based on the technics I learned from the amazing Shani. In a simple, clear, and elegant style: I enjoyed the journey and the content is perfect.
Script-changing course, very well done. An eloquent speaker and well delivered.
The course presents articulate suggestions with logical progression at a comfortable pace. It will definitely improve my copy editing.
It was very clear. I only wish he ran through creating his own work. From assignment to the end of editing.

I have been trained in law school to write in legalese and passive sentences. This course started with the 4 rules to write clearly and succinctly. I also like the tips on editing for communicating effectively. I would be applying these copy-writing techniques in building my online presence and authority in my area of practice. Thank you very much for this, Shani!
I learned a lot from this course.Basic copy writing and editing techniques now guarded me to shape a valuable content.The learners spoke very simply and taught the skills effectively.
I liked the rhythm of the course and the simplicity of ideas. Thanks for sharing and for helping me out!
Excellent! Very clear and well paced. Easy to understand with insightful content. Highly recommend.
more about the mechanics of writing than how to be a great copywriter. great course if that is what one is looking for but i was looking more for copywriting content, not structure or style

The course gave a great overall viewpoint of how to make your writing better. However, the subtitles were incorrect in a lot of places, which should be looked into as the clarity is lost in some places, which, given the course topic, is not ideal.
I really liked the way this author simplifies all the concepts. It makes it very easy to understand and apply.
Very informative. The style and flow of the course make the content "easy to digest".
A lot of valuable information is packed into this course. I am looking forward to applying the new techniques that I learned.
A worthwhile course to undertake. The tutor delivered the content so well!

I appreciated this course and its effectiveness. I really liked the short videos because they provided a convenient way for me to pace myself and learn a lot in a short period of time. The practice examples provided in the videos were challenging and fun. I am glad that I purchased this course. I feel that I have gained so much and have improved as both a writer and an editor.
Great course for sharpening your writing skills!

It covers fundamentals mostly and is perfect for those who are starting their writing journey. Even if you are an experienced copywriter, the course will help you revisit the basics and enhance your skills. I thoroughly enjoyed the course. It was very detailed and shared tons of exercises.

Le contenu est tr√®s enrichissant, je recommande.
Un grand Merci pour la qualit√© de ce cours.
This course was very informative. It was also engaging and very educational. I can't wait to apply the new skills I've learned to my writing!
Good content!
This course is helpful for both beginners and advanced copywriters. I recommend it to anyone who wants to expand their knowledge and bring better services to their clients.
The course was very detailed, well thought-out and included helpful examples through every chapter. I learned a lot from the course and would definitely recommend to a friend.

Mr. Raja's course was great. I took one of his Udemy courses before and was inspired by him to do more in the editing arena, to use my skillsets learned in corporate for freelance opportunities. The course kept my attention, was practical with engaging examples. I love the way he referenced writing as being musical. I appreciate his suggestions for using his tools right away. And the best takeaway is the editing guide - I will keep this close by.

This course was prepared well and expertly delivered. It helped me realize which skills I need to refine and which ones I am already proficient at. The course taught me how to improve my copywriting and take it to the next level.
Thank you, Shani Raja, for making this course simple, clear, elegant, and evocative!
Fantastic course. It kept me interested and highlighted several things that I need to improve on.
Very insightful and engaging videos
This was an excellent and thorough video.  It was a great refresher course as well as an enhancer! It was definitely relevant to my business and I'm looking forward to implementing the tools.

A really clear, concise and practical guide to improving your writing and editing ability. The material was presented in a way which kept you involved and engaged. You learn tips and techniques which have an immediate positive impact on your written work.
Happy about my purchase and the clear, detailed lessons. Worth every penny.
I've been a journalist and copywriter for more than 20 years, and I learned new things. Highly recommend this course as a helpful refresher on basics and an opportunity to learn new things.
I really liked the way the tutor explains all the concepts, smooth and well delivered.
The course is direct and to the point. I have a lot of useful information at my disposal due to this course.

Taking this course felt like a window into another world. It gave me the answers to the questions that I so often deliberate over and second-guess with my own writing sometimes leading to a long, drawn out process. 
I feel empowered. The editing technique and the secret sauce were the places I needed to go, and pleased that I already follow many of the steps.  

I worked alongside the course, attemping each exercise and comparing my results to the the final, more refined versions. I will most likely take the course again, after I've revisited some of my own posts. I highly recommend this course.
nice Couse I learned a lot!
Good useful content
Very detailed explanation in simple language. Very useful for complete beginners

I have learned so much needed insight on the fundamental writing structures which will enable me to give high-quality writing skills to any project presented at hand. so much confidence received. thank you so much
Fantastic course! I learned a lot!
One of the best courses to develop your writing skills: clear, effective, easy ! Thanks Sir Raja.
Great course!
I enjoyed this course. The ideas are clear and easy to follow.
I had an awesome time learning. I now see words differently and know how to make my writing more firm, clearer and alluring. Thank you! It was worth my money!
Very helpful and insightful!

This course was wonderful for a new writer. I love how he spelled out all of the things that make a good writer in a clear and simple way. It made copywriting feel less intimidating by equipping me with skills that build competence and confidence. Thank you!
Great course! Contains a ton of tips that help you fine tune your copywriting to make it impactful and stylistic.
A truly fantastic course. Even for a reasonably experienced writer like myself, I still learnt a tremendous amount about how to improve my copywriting.
Simply amazing! This video is very informative, providing me with the key aspects and necessary tools used to compose a well-written copy. Thank you Shani!

Oh my god. I will always come back to this course. I have never seen a course more helpful and useful than this one. I wish I had found him sooner. Please, PLEASE take this course. It has helped me in so many ways. My writing is so much better. I was skeptical at first because I had no idea who this guy was. I thought it might be unhelpful or a waste of money. But I think the price needs to be raised by a lot. And I would still pay for it, even after the price was raised. Now I am just rambling, but I am genuinely so thankful for this.

Does what it says on the tin, it is clear, easy to follow and the mini quizzes help to solidify the learning. Would have liked to look at the different types of copy, headlines, sales copy etc to find out what makes good copy vs a bad copy in these specific topics but there was no promise of this in the contents so can't complain. Overall, well presented, a great reference guide course one that I'll be revisiting again and again.
great course I have learned a lot about writing stimulating copy!
There is a grammatical error in the Chapter 4 quiz. It completely threw me off. It's a good course. I would recommend it. Just keep an eye on the Chapter 4 quiz.

This course is a great, comprehensive introduction to copy writing and editing that lays the groundwork for users to learn the necessary tools for improving their writing and then how to go out and use them. I feel much more informed and prepared to move on with my newly acquired skills. The examples, with time for us to make our own attempts first before the instructor gave their take, helped to compare and gauge our own style and skills against a good example from the instructor.
Outstanding experience! Professional, organized, relevant, and engaging.
This course was easy to follow, and I was able to complete it quickly.

The course to Master my copywriting skills was short, concise, and clear. It was an exciting and informative lecture. The quizzes added some flair, creating this interactive aspect. I would definitely recommend this to anyone interested in the 'secret sauce' of mastering copywriting.
Straight to the point, easily digestible, 110% worth your time and money to bring new tools to your copywriting toolbox.
Very useful information that is presented in a straightforward way. I really enjoyed this course.

This is the best course I ever took on Fiverr. I have learned so much. My foundation is now stronger because of all the skills I have learned. I feel more confident in my writing. The entire course was easy to understand and helped boost my confidence. I no longer feel confused about starting to write. This course has given me everything I need to begin my copywriting career. I am so grateful that I chose this course. I will definitely recommend it to anyone & everyone.

Great course. It was very informative and interactive. I would definitely recommend it. My only suggestion is to include a piece of writing for the student to edit in 'Chapter 6: Editing with Style.' I'm completely new to this, so I didn't even know where to start to find a piece of writing to edit. That made that chapter very challenging to complete successfully.
Great course. Very unique insights. With practical steps to learn the maximum. I recommend üëç

There were some useful tips that I could take to heart as an experienced writer.

If I was at a beginner level, I would have the ability to vastly improve very quickly thanks to this class.
This lesson was incredibly well done. I learned many new tips and tricks, and will be applying these skills in all of my writing from now on.
It was a very informative and easy to follow course.
Great course with useful tips and tricks from an experienced writer. Learned new perspectives on the art of copywriting and writing in general. Highly recommend.

the course give me alot to think about in copywriting  how this can work as good on paper and how  good this skill can take me as a writer .  this course have some value  to learn and putting it to use may be very helpful .
Short and Sweet!. I enjoyed it.  A good crash course on writing and copy-editing.
Great course. I must say I learned a lot.
Good to start writing copy and found some inspiration
The most elaborate organised and well explained course I've ever had.
Very clear and practical. I enjoyed learning the basics of copywriting.

Quite disappointed! I didn't see any practical or applicable advice. In fact, it was full of generalities and fluffy things that can be taught in school. Completely unprofessional content for a 43$ course.

Spent money to learn things that are completely obvious to almost any writer. Moreover, the way that useless stuff was presented was too slow. Too many words and analyzing for stating something too simple.

It should be marked as a course for pretty unknowledgeable people about writing who haven‚Äôt graduated from school! ...And for sure the cost of $43 is ridiculous for the quality I received! Very unsatisfied!

I feel like there could have been more concrete examples or tips provided. This didn't provide anything unique or valuable that couldn't be found in a "top 10" style blog or YouTube video. I was hoping for something more from a course called "Master Your Copywriting." This felt like copywriting for beginners.
This course was presented well, was clear and offered good examples to better understand the concepts being taught.

I am very happy I took this course.  Mr. Raja is knowledgable, experienced, and creative.  I write on a daily basis, and I would highly recommend him to anyone who seeks to sharpen their writing and editing skills.  I would add that this course is useful for either the beginner or the more seasoned writer.  
The lessons learned here will always be an essential part of my writing toolbox.
I'm really enjoying this course so far! The instructor is clear, precise and helpful. Additionally, there are exercises in the videos to enhance your writing skills.
Very informative.

I enjoyed the lessons, they were clear and straightforward. Many of the points the instructor mentioned, I have already been practicing in my writings. He provided useful techniques to keep in mind when reading and editing text. I will definitely start reading the Economist to improve my writing skills ;) Thank you! :)

Loads of good tips and techniques that are woefully ignored by too many folks, online and off! As someone with years of experience writing often lengthy and/or technical reports, (and sadly, reading many similar documents too!), I have acquired many of these points already, but it is still useful to review them in a course like this.

Really well presented too - I appreciated that pace and clarity with which the material was delivered.
I thoroughly enjoyed this course. Shani's teaching style made these critical tactics easy to digest and apply.

I enjoyed the course, learned a lot.
I need more practice on my writing skills. The course sky-rockets my learning with wonderful tips and tricks.
a specific, authentic & evocative course for becoming a Great copywrither
Brilliant and thoroughly on point. Great reminders. I enjoyed his lessons.
Loved the editing tips at the end of this course!
I enjoyed this course. As a beginner I found that the content was easy to follow and understand. I had a few ‚Äòlightbulb moments‚Äô and I‚Äôm looking forward to practising the techniques.
It was structured well but I didn't feel it was very tactical or specific.

I like that it has a nice slow pace, so I can process everything he is saying much faster and clearly.
Loving it!

It's great and insightfullüßê ,but It would be better if there was an app on IOS and Android like LinkedIn Learning so that you can download the course and watch it offline and it will be extremely accessible
Absolutely useful & helpful for anyone looking to develop their understanding in  copywriting fundamentals. I recommend this video to anyone who wants to master their craft with handy writing tools.

I've taken many courses on the internet on copywriting and this one ranks as a top one. The content is simply, clear and engaging. The mini quizzes are great to test your skills after each section. The instructor, Shani Raja, has been one of my favorite instructors so far. You can tell he is top in the industry and brings editorial expereince which I found extremely helpful. Highly reccomend!

Extremely insightful course -- as someone who's a bit further down in their copywriting career, I was hoping to find something that offered new perspectives and useful tools for the future. This both confirmed my approach and brought on loads of new tips for writing & editing my content. Great information for both beginners and intermediate levels! I highly recommend and would love to learn more from Shani.
Highly helpful course.
The course was fantastic. The secret sauce and the 13 editing points would help me with my projects. Worth the payment!
Clear, comprehensive, with helpful examples
Great content!
Great value!  The course is clear and useful for every person who wants to improve their copy skills!  I Highly recommend it!

I took this course to brush up on the writing skills learned in college. If only Shani Raja had been my professor back then! His explanations were thorough and elegantly delivered. This course reminded me of things I had forgotten and introduced techniques that will prove to be invaluable as I further my copywriting career goals.

Very informative. I was familiar with a couple of things offered in this course. However, I still took a significant amount of new information home. Most of all, the well structured editing technique will help me improve my writing in the future. Thank you.
Great course, even for seasoned pros like me :) Shani gives a lot of practical tips and insights that can be applied straight away to elevate your writing. Highly recommend.
Excellent course!
An excellent, straight-forward, no fluff course on how to immediately improve your writing.
Clear, concise, and informative. I highly recommend this course.
Shani put together a helpful and informative course.
This was an informative and engaging course. Highly recommended for anyone looking to adding copywriting to their skillset.
Very impactful; filled with useful knowledge and resources.
good course

I always like the content that I write in my daily job as part of my duties to present to the public through advertisements or internet posting. I know there will be a course that will help me to improve my writing skills. Here you go! This course is simple to understand and features packed to fit all levels of writers! Great
Great !!

From Structure To Style: Master Your Copywriting course helps aspiring writers set a solid foundation for their writing style. I needed the inside knowledge and strategies to build my confidence. I highly recommend!
Phenomenal clarity throughout the course! I learned so much and was able to immediately put my new knowledge into practice. Will go back to it over and over again to refine my skills even more.
Exceptionally good. Thank you.
This course provides an easy to digest packed set of skills, necessary to all writters.

Amazing course! I am writing for over a decade, yet this course provided the much-needed fresh perspective and knowledge to sharpen my writing. The instructor is super amazing and his words and accent felt like melted butter mixed with sweet honey. I am really happy to learn things that will help me to provide better services at Fiverr.
This course has been crucial to building confidence and overcoming imposter syndrome, which had been holding me back. I now can't wait to kickstart my Fiverr career - thank you!
excellent introduction to some basic skills for improving your writing

A delight to watch. It was broken down into easily manageable steps. With the encouragement to complete tasks throughout the course, it was not only informative but required a level of proactiveness to build the skills.
This course has been so helpful. It's shown me the difference between a good copywriter, and a great one. I love the bite-sized learning bits, combined with action you can take now to implement them.
well structured, simple, and easy to follow.

Overall the course was great. I have read many books on writing well, and most of what the course covered was review for me. The quick-smart editing system is unique, and I look forward to applying it in my writing. I highly recommend this course to copywriters looking to level up their art.

The course was very helpful in showing me how to tighten up my writing. I learned to eliminate weak words and add in words that give my writing color and movement. My copy flows so much better and is clearly understood.

Truly a masterclass of information here. I found the breakdown of the editing process the most informative list I've come across (and I've taken a lot of online courses) Give this a shot if you want to improve your copywriting horizons.

This course made the editing process less daunting. It helped me take a step back, look at my writing objectively, and enjoy the editing process. I believe that this has helped me become a better writer and editor.

This course presented the mindset, skills, and knowledge of a master copywriter. It was easy to follow along, to understand, and apply what was being taught in the course. If you intend to excel in writing or editing, this course is a must!
Great insight!!
It would be beneficial to provide a copy that needs to be edited.
Excellent course! I love it,
Very informative
This course was very helpful and enlightening.

I was disappointed in the first few modules; it didn't teach me anything I didn't already know.

But I quickly realized that the familiar content served as a refresher. I instinctively implemented the tips from those lessons and noticed an immediate improvement.

The rest of the course content was new to me, especially the quick-smart editing system. Loved it!

I encourage you to enroll whether you're a novice or seasoned copywriter. You won't be disappointed.
I learned a lot from this course. I loosely knew many of the concepts discussed; however, learning about them in detail was helpful. I can't wait to implement the "secret sauce" into my next edit.

A very well planned, structured and sequenced course full of unique highly practical and relatable content that Shani (the course owner) presents well. Shani is obviously an expert copywriter and editor and I enjoyed the way he delivered the course and exercises in an interesting and relatable way.

I feel like I already was striving to make my copywriting and texts the way the instructor teaches you to. However, being taught tools and frameworks is a really good way that one always achieves what one strives to do. I now have a valuable document filled with notes that will serve to guide my writing.

Great course!
An excellent first course for any beginner to dip their toes and in!
it was informative!

Shani Raja is SUPERB!!! This was one of the best online courses I have ever experienced. Thank you, Shani, for sharing your expertise and knowledge in such a profound way. I will use this course as a reference, probably for the rest of my life!

Many of the principles and techniques presented in this course took me decades to learn, and while many of them were familiar, I still took away something of real value. The section on editing was of particular interest.
   The materials offered here strike me as a useful toolkit for people looking to advance their writing skills and might just save you a quarter century of intuitive improvement. I should have done this years ago.

Damon Wolfe.
This course is wonderful! Thank you.
Nice helpful course.
This course is credible, makes me feel empowered,
This course is truly a masterpiece. I enjoyed to learn and this brought to me new dimensions and new colors.
Excellent course! This is the place to take your writing to the next level!

The course is everything I could have asked for in a copywriting tutorial and more! It's concise, comprehensive, yet easy to understand. The instructor has done a fantastic job at making sure that even those with no experience can follow along easily - which means you'll be able to get your first step on the right path as soon as possible.
Very informative!
I find this course so worth it - the instructor takes care to explain everything clearly and with examples. Can't wait to apply everything I learned in my writing.
Wonderful and simple overview of how to improve ones writing skills!

I really enjoyed how clearly he spoke and the tools he provided were truly helpful. I have already found myself writing differently by following his advice. I look forward to using the editing techniques as well in the future as I'm sure they are valuable.

This course can help anyone here on Fiverr! I can't wait to put up another gig and put to use everything I just learned in this course. For most of us, it's been a while since we were in college, and this course is a great reminder of what we studied and includes new ways of looking at effective writing. Money well spent!
Amazing! Taught me everything there is to know about how to make my writing connect with a wider audience.
Very educational and inspiring course on writing! I look forward to putting my new knowledge to work.
Definitely an engaging and informative class!
It is a highly paunchy and evocative discussion.
Excellent instructor! I have gained useful, applicable information, and I now feel more confident in my writing pursuits.
I feel confident about my ability to succeed after taking this course. Thank you for sharing your wisdom!
Amazing course. Incredible value.
Great Overall. But unless you're a complete newbie to copywriting, there's not much to learn, as most of the lessons weren't really in-depth. Good refresher course, anyway.

I absolutely recommend this course to anyone looking to refine their writing skills. The instructor, Shani, is not only knowledgeable, but he also presents the material in a very clear and concise manner. I could listen to him talk all day, he has such a soothing voice.
I feel like I learned a lot from Shani and am confident that as I practice the exercises he gave, I will continue to sharpen my writing skills. Thank you for this valuable course!
Jade

Excellent information, it definetly helped me broaden my knowledge in this field and hopefully support me in finding more employers for my gigs by having the badge on my account. 

I highly recommend this course and thank you once again for providing such quality for beginner freelancers like me.
Offer great and detailed insights.
Great content, lucid explanations, loved how the structure was explained
It's exactly what it needs to be while captivating and inspiring. Excellent.
Nice summary on text construction and editing. Some parts could be shortened though, in order for other important points to be discussed

I am a Pastor, Coach and Teacher. My presentations were not that good. I felt that my work sometimes lacked clarity, and the flow of points, therefore not punchier. From the time I started putting into action what I have learnt, I have seen a great improvement in my articles. 

I encourage anyone who writes blogs, courses, teaches or preaches to take this course. It is one of the best courses for those who want to master copywriting. 

I want to say thank you to the teacher. In a short space of time, I have gained so much knowledge and confidence in my writing and course layout.

Excellent course, it made me realize my weak points and correct them, ir also helped me to improve my writing style. It opened my eyes and now I read the documents that are sent to me with more critical eyes and correct them in a faster and more efficient way.
A great foundation and framework. Now use it or lose it!
Overall the information was great! I'd love examples of the different types of copy people pay copywriters to write. So I can see his system put into real paid jobs.
This is an amazing course for copywriters, It will help you grow and widen your writing skills.

This course is worth every single penny. It dives into how to write exquisite prose, which is done clearly and elegantly. Theory and practice are well combined: expect a welcoming course which truly improves your writing skills.
The course was informative, with tips and valuable guidance from novice to seasoned writers. I am grateful that Fiverr offers these courses to improve sellers' competencies.
You need this course to get started copywriting!
it helps me to start with my copyrighting journey
Very clear, straight forward approach!
very informal
The presenter speaks in clear terms and introduces concepts in a simple way. The ideas that are introduced are explained in great detail.
Well planned and curated course. Had a informative time learning with this course.

I was very pleased with the course. Not only is Shani Raja a great writer but a stellar presenter as well. Although I work in advertising, marketing, and therefore copywriting for quite some time now (I also try to improve my skills whenever I can), I learned even more and manifested what I already knew. I also found confirmation about my skillset and intuition within that course. I would highly recommend this course to anyone who is interested in developing their skills as a writer and to everyone who wants to touch up their skills as well.
So far, this course has proven to be very insightful!
Very comprehensive and explicit course. Many respects and congrats to the instructor!
The writer has put every fundamental rule of copywriting uniquely. There is so much to learn from this course, and I'm satisfied.
I've been writing for years, and I've found it useful in learning the different tools for copywriting. I can't wait to apply them to help my future clients.
Excellent Course. I recommend it.
Great Learning Experience.

This course creates the right mindset for copywriting but also offers the tools to do it the right way. I like how the instructor explains every single point of his method which can be applied to a broad range of texts. For a start, I will use this knowledge to update my gig descriptions. Mr. Shani Raja, I am more than grateful to you. I will also take your punctuation mastery course on Udemy. See you there!
Seems to be some glitching when moving to and from these review pages, but otherwise great course.

I love the calm way Shani Raja explains the process of copywriting and some important pieces of it. I surely have to do the workshop many times to get comfortable with the topic and I will do it gladly.

I'm extremely new to copywriting so I decided it would be helpful for me to buy this course. Not only has it been educational in a sense that will make me a better copywriter, but also as a writer as a whole. I very much recommend it to anyone looking to further their skills as a writer.
Gotta visit each chapter again. That was how valuable this course was.
Great course on copywriting skills, the four ingredients to the secret sauce and how to edit well!
This course was very informative and easy to listen to and comprehend. I can apply all the the information immediately. Well worth the investment.

This is an amazing course! Shani describes the "art" of writing in a new way. His detailed explanations have given me a different perspective on the craft. After taking this course, you will have a unique awareness when you write copy. I highly recommend this course for anyone who is interested in honing their writing skills. Thank you Shani!!!
I like how he explains, and his sense of humor.

Very good course !
the narrator knows his subject well.
It‚Äôs clearly explained, I recommend it

Very good information. The instructor is clear, concise, and authentic.

Excellent all around!
Very useful. There are a few things I already knew but a dusting off never hurts!
jkljl;jljk
Loving this course so far. I'm only through the first chapter, but I want to keep going! The lessons are short, effective and practical. Perfect for me!

I learned alot of  knowledge  .It gave me a new insight of good copywriting.
Great course.

Very pleasant course with good explanations. The target group is rather people who have not yet dealt intensively with the topic, for experienced people it is rather a repetition or a "confirmation" of their knowledge.

I liked how he explained the general things first and then deep dived into each aspect. 
Explanations were exactly as his writing style: Simple, Clear, Elegant and Evocative. 
Thank you very much!
Very engaging course that has a wealth of information and will no doubt enhance anybody's career in copy writing, editing and more.
I'm only at chapter two, but it's a wonderfully insightful course so far! I'm excited to complete it and master my copywriting!
good content, subtitles are inconsistent
This course is extremely clear and well-organized. The tools shared by the instructor are concise and easy to follow.  I will be using and re-using the information to shape superlative copywriting.

The course was a great eye opening learning process for me. The strategies I have learned will serve me well in all my spheres of writing and editing. 

The presenter was very good. I found his tone and pace to be quite appropriate to the objective learning, especially since I have never attended a writing course before now. 

Thank you very much and congratulations on a job well done.

Winston Warren
Clear and concise. Worth the time and money.

The information shared are practical and simple, anyone can implement the principals. Everything you need for writing great copy. 
43$ well spent! heavily underpriced.

There were plenty of examples to drive the lessons home so there wasn't any confusion.

The only thing I wish there was included in this bundle was selling the skills. 
It's only the art of writing great copy you learn here... but selling your copy isn't in focus.

The course is well structured and clearly presented. The lecturer exudes great calm and therefore a great deal of confidence. 
I would also like to have such courses in my (working) language.
The teacher of this course was clear, simple, evocative, and elegant
A fantastic, to-the-point course from an expert in the field.
